description: Numbers n such that n is composite and sigma(n) / d(n) is prime.
links: T. D. Noe and Donovan Johnson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000 (first 259 terms from T. D. Noe)
example: For n=6 (composite), sigma(6)=12, d(6)=4 and 12/4 = 3 is prime.
author: _G. L. Honaker, Jr._
extensions: More terms from Michel ten Voorde (seqfan(AT)tenvoorde.org)
